definition: time of business/opening hours (of shop)/working time
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Wife:Twenty minutes just to find out what their business hours are?
sentences.chinese: 二十分钟才查出他们的营业时间？

sentences.english: He wanted to amortize his fixed rental cost by stretching the operating hours.
sentences.chinese: 他想用延长营业时间来分摊固定的租金。

sentences.english: The postal savings has more business hours than the banks.
sentences.chinese: 邮政储蓄的好处是营业时间比银行的要长。

sentences.english: Karin: I'm calling to find out your business hours.
sentences.chinese: 我打电话想知道你这里的营业时间。
我们的营业时间为早7点到晚23点。

sentences.english: Shirley: What are your business hours?
sentences.chinese: 你们的营业时间是什么？

sentences.english: Business hours from 5 p. m. to 2 a. m. , the working time can negotiate.
sentences.chinese: 营业时间下午5点至凌晨2点，工作时间可以协商。
你们的营业时间是什么？

sentences.english: Our business hour are 9A. M. to 10P. M.
sentences.chinese: 我们的营业时间是上午9点钟到下午的10点钟。

sentences.english: Our business hours are 9A. M. to 10P. M…
sentences.chinese: 我们的营业时间是上午9点钟到下午的10点钟。

sentences.english: A: What are your business hours?
sentences.chinese: 你们的营业时间是什么？

sentences.english: They were hoping the extra hours would help their profits in the homestretch.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望最后几天延长营业时间能够增加商店的盈利。

sentences.english: Restaurants and spas staggered hours to reduce staffing.
sentences.chinese: 餐馆和温泉的营业时间相互错开，以便减少人手。

sentences.english: It is open from 9 a. m. to 11 p. m.
sentences.chinese: 它的营业时间是早上9点到晚上11点。

definition: to close shop in the evening/also pr. [da3 yang2]
to reserve a seat/to book a table/reservation
